summary: This bill, the Protect Our Military Families’ 2nd Amendment Rights Act, aims to ensure that members of the Armed Forces and their spouses have the same rights regarding firearms at their duty station locations. It amends Title 18 of the United States Code to clarify residency definitions for firearm purposes for military personnel and their spouses, and to allow spouses to receive firearms at the duty station location. The provisions take effect six months after the bill's enactment.
